knimeNode.name: TrackletImageGenerator
knimeNode.shortDescription: Creates a 2D tracking image out of a defined 'scripting language'

fullDescription.intro:
Creates a 2D tracking image out of a defined 'scripting language':
A point is given by (x,y,z)
A line is either defined by (x,y,time)-(x,y,time), which means from start point to end point,
or by (x,y,time)+(deltaX,deltaY,deltaTime), which means from start point in the given direction

views.view: A view for the image view
